WorkItem.Description: I am using datajs to do cross domain request, and I have enabled the jsonp-callback but just found that when i requested the metadata, i got response like this: __Resource interpreted as Script but transferred with MIME type application/xml: "http://localhost:8000/d.svc/$metadata?$callback=parent.handleJSONP_0&$format=xml".__ and also it said: __Uncaught SyntaxError: Unexpected token <__, so if anyone has come across the sam issue...
